title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.6 - Permit to operate farm labor camp commissary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 197.6 - Permit to operate farm labor camp commissary

State Regulations
(a) A permit to operate a farm labor camp
commissary must be conspicuously posted in the commissary. (b) A permit holder shall also post and keep
posted in a conspicuous place in the commissary, on a form supplied by the
commissioner, the current prices of all goods sold or leased, and the prices
charged shall not exceed the prices listed on the poster. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
197.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
